posts.title: Getting Started with Vue 3
posts.body: Vue 3 is the latest major version of Vue.js that brings many exciting features including the Composition API, better TypeScript support, and improved performance. In this article, we'll explore the basics of Vue 3 and how to get started with it.

posts.title: Understanding the Vue.js Composition API
posts.body: The Composition API is a new feature in Vue 3 that provides a more flexible way to organize component logic. It allows for better code reuse and typescript support compared to the Options API.
